articles.author: Laurence Edmondson
articles.title: Red Bull vs Mercedes: Who looks stronger after round one? - ESPN.co.uk
articles.description: Despite Lewis Hamilton beating Max Verstappen at the Bahrain Grand Prix, it appears as though Red Bull has the advantage in 2021. Of course, there's no guarantee it will stay like that.
articles.content:
